name: Cybersecurity & Blockchain Core Team Lead at GDSC CVR (2024-2025)
description: Actively contributing to security initiatives and collaborating with the core team to strengthen cybersecurity efforts at Google Developer Student Clubs (GDSC) CVR.

name: Certificate of Participation in GreenBiz’23 Hackathon
description: Successfully participated in the GreenBiz’23 Hackathon, showcasing problem-solving skills and collaboration in developing innovative solutions for sustainable business practices. Held during November 24th and 25th, 2023.

name: Certificate of Achievement - Winner in Chemistry Elocution
description: Secured the first position and was awarded the winner in the Chemistry Elocution competition as part of AntahPragnya 2020.
